TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IListenerChannelCallback

Docs.summary: Provides listener-channel notifications from protocol handlers to the worker process framework. Also enables protocol handlers to access additional parameters, such as the ID of the listener channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetBlob (byte[] buffer, ref int bufferSize);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetBlob([out] unsigned int8[] buffer, int32& bufferSize) cil managed
Public Sub GetBlob (buffer As Byte(), ByRef bufferSize As Integer)
public: void GetBlob(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int % bufferSize);

Docs.param: The data that will be passed to the listener channel.
The amount of data, in bytes, that is in the buffer.
Docs.summary: Retrieves data that the protocol manager will pass to a listener channel when the protocol manager is starting that listener channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback.GetBlob%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetBlobLength() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the size of the buffered data in the listener channel.
Docs.returns: The size, in bytes, of the data that is in the listener channel buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback.GetBlobLength%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetId() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the ID of a listener channel that has to be started.
Docs.returns: The ID of the listener channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback.GetId%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportMessageReceived() cil managed

Docs.summary: Notifies the worker process framework that a new message was received.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method supports the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback.ReportMessageReceived%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportStarted() cil managed

Docs.summary: Notifies the worker process framework that a listener channel has started.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback.ReportStarted%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportStopped(int32 hr) cil managed

Docs.param: The HRESULT value that reports the status of a listener channel.
Docs.summary: Notifies the worker process framework that a listener channel has stopped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback.ReportStopped%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
